briefTitle: OxyNorm Capsules in Post-Operative Pain Study
officialTitle: A Double-blind, Randomized, Parallel Group Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety, of Oxycodone Immediate-release Capsules Versus Morphine Immediate-release Tablets in Hospitalized Patients With Moderate to Severe Pain Following Surgery.
summary: The efficacy and safety of oxycodone capsules compared with morphine tablets in hospitalized patients with moderate to severe pain following surgery.

primaryOutcome.measure: Visual Analogue Scale (VAS) in Resting Stage at 6hour (6hour±20 Minutes After Administration of First Dose)
